data.name: Legal
data.value: LEGAL

data.name: IAgreeToTC
data.value: I AGREE TO THE TERMS AND CONDITIONS

data.name: TermsAndConditionsGeneral1
data.value: If your benefit plan includes Online Claims Submission, this App will provide a feature for submitting claims. When you submit claims using the MÉDIC Mobile App Online Claim Submission feature, you agree to the following: "I agree that all information provided using Online claim submission will be complete and accurate. In the event that my information is found to be incomplete or inaccurate, I understand that MÉDIC reserves the right to remove my online claiming privileges. I understand that the information, including the personal information, that I provide to MÉDIC Construction about myself and my dependents, will be used by MÉDIC for claims adjudication and any other services necessary in the administration of my benefits which may include the exchange of information with other parties to administer this benefit plan.

data.name: TermsAndConditionsGeneral2
data.value: I am authorized by my spouse and/or dependents to disclose and receive information about them that is used for these purposes. My spouse and/or dependents understand that this information may be seen by me, the cardholder and used by MÉDIC and the other parties referenced in this agreement for the purposes set out in this agreement.

data.name: TermsAndConditionsGeneral3
data.value: When submitting claims online, MÉDIC may select my claim for audit. If so requested, I am responsible for producing the original receipt(s) within 30 days.

data.name: TermsAndConditionsGeneral4
data.value: If I fail to provide the receipt(s) to MÉDIC, or provide false, incomplete, or misleading information, MÉDIC reserves the right to classify my claim as an overpayment and will deduct such monies from any future claim payments. Furthermore, my coverage may be denied or terminated and/or online submission may be revoked.

data.name: TermsAndConditionsGeneral5
data.value: I understand and agree that I am responsible for retaining original receipt(s) for 13 months following the date of my claim submission(s).

data.name: TermsAndConditionsGeneral6
data.value: MÉDIC maintains a national database of providers and their association with any regulatory agency, professional association or educational program. MÉDIC reviews each provider to determine which benefits/services are eligible for reimbursement in conjunction with the plan member’s health benefits plan. When submitting a claim online, with a provider that has not registered with MÉDIC, the provider’s credentials will be verified and my claim will be processed accordingly.

data.name: TermsAndConditionsGeneral7
data.value: Acceptance of the Online Claim Submission Agreement Terms and Conditions applies to all claims submitted within an online session. If I submit multiple claims (for a different dependent and/or provider) within the online session, my acceptance of the Online Claim Submission Agreement Terms and Conditions applies to all those claims submitted."

data.name: GeneralContent6
data.value: https://sel.ccq.org/

data.name: GeneralContent8
data.value: click here

data.name: MyIdCardText
data.value: MY MÉDIC CONSTRUCTION CARD

data.name: claimConfirm_description
data.value: The above information will be submitted to MÉDIC Construction. Please ensure the information is correct before proceeding. If you need to change the information, please click the back button to return to the claim submission form. Otherwise click the Submit button to submit the claim to MÉDIC Construction.

data.name: claimConfirm_id_number
data.value: MÉDIC Construction ID Number

data.name: DisclaimerFirstParagraph
data.value:
I declare that all of the information provided in the present claim is complete and accurate.
I understand that the CCQ may reject a claim related to a dependent following a false declaration or an omission to update the information concerning that dependent (e.g., cessation of cohabitation with my spouse following failure of the marital relationship, dropping out of school, end of full-time studies or change to matrimonial status of my adult dependent child). I also understand that the CCQ may, if applicable, claim directly from me any money that it has paid in relation to such a claim or consider that it is an excess payment that can be deducted from my future claims for benefits.
For the purposes of administration and of evaluation of claims and for fraud prevention, I authorize Médic Construction to obtain personal, medical, and psychosocial information and disclose it to the plan administrators and to regulatory and law enforcement agencies. I understand that the information will be used and preserved by Médic Construction for administration of benefits.

data.name: DisclaimerSecondParagraph
data.value: I am authorized by my dependents to disclose and receive information about them concerning their claims for benefits. My dependents understand that this information will be seen by me and used by the CCQ for the purposes of management and administration of my plan.

data.name: AuditDisclaimerFirstParagraph
data.value:
I declare that all of the information provided in the present claim is complete and accurate.
I understand that the CCQ may reject a claim related to a dependent following a false declaration or an omission to update the information concerning that dependent (e.g., cessation of cohabitation with my spouse following failure of the marital relationship, dropping out of school, end of full-time studies or change to matrimonial status of my adult dependent child). I also understand that the CCQ may, if applicable, claim directly from me any money that it has paid in relation to such a claim or consider that it is an excess payment that can be deducted from my future claims for benefits.
For the purposes of administration and of evaluation of claims and for fraud prevention, I authorize Médic Construction to obtain personal, medical, and psychosocial information and disclose it to the plan administrators and to regulatory and law enforcement agencies. I understand that the information will be used and preserved by Médic Construction for administration of benefits.

data.name: AuditDisclaimerThirdParagraph
data.value: I am authorized by my dependents to disclose and receive information about them concerning their claims for benefits. My dependents understand that this information will be seen by me and used by the CCQ for the purposes of management and administration of my plan.

data.name: NoActiveClaimsLabel
data.value: We have everything we need! Your requests for settlement do not require any further information. Please keep your documentation for 12 months.

data.name: VisionEnhancementsMessage
data.value: The See better to succeed program offers a $250 reimbursement per 24-month period for purchases of glasses or contact lenses prescribed by a professional to correct the vision of any child under 18 years of age. Only purchases made after September 1, 2019 from an optician or optometrist in Québec are eligible. You must submit your claim even if the amount offered by the government covers the total purchase amount.

data.name: VisionEnhancementsProgramName
data.value: See better to succeed

data.name: VisionEnhancementsProgramAdditionalInfo
data.value: You must submit your claim even if the amount offered by the government covers the total purchase amount.

data.name: ClaimDetailsOtherBenefitsTitle
data.value: Do you have coverage under another benefits plan (other than a provincial plan)?

data.name: DirectDepositOptInMessage
data.value: I authorize GSC to deposit funds directly into the bank account noted below. I understand that I will no longer receive statements from GSC in the mail as my statements will only be available online.

data.name: DDConfirmAuthoriseDepositFundLabel
data.value: I acknowledge that it is my responsibility to ensure the accuracy of my banking details and that GSC accepts no responsibility and cannot be held liable if any information provided is incorrect, incomplete, or inaccurate.

data.name: DDResultDisclaimer3
data.value: In addition, I acknowledge that GSC is not responsible for any damage, claim, or cause of action, of any nature whatsoever, that may result from any direct deposit made using this bank account information or that may arise from the provision of incorrect, incomplete, or inaccurate bank account information. Therefore, I hold the insurer and the carrier harmless of any responsibility in this regard.
